title: Yes, they were lying
author: VD
content_html:
The NYT spells out the discrepancy in reported sexual partners for defensive feminists and the mathematically challenged:

0-1
—-
M 16.6%
F 25.0%


2-6
—-
M 33.8%
F 44.3%


7-14
—-
M 20.7%
F 21.3%


15+
—-
M 28.9%
F 09.4%


Yes, I suppose that probably was redundant.
